trans-unit.source: Defines the base class from which all federation message classes derive.

At a minimum, you must override the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.ProviderIdentifier" /> property and the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.Write(System.IO.TextWriter)" /> method in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: Como mínimo, debe invalidar el <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.ProviderIdentifier" /> propiedad y el <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.Write(System.IO.TextWriter)" /> método en clases derivadas.

trans-unit.source: The base URL to which the federation message applies.
Initializes the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.BaseUri" /> property.
Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage" /> class.
<paramref name="baseUri" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="baseUri" /> is not a valid, absolute URI.
Gets or sets the base URL to which the message applies.
A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the base URL.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> que contiene la dirección URL base.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set a value that is <see langword="null" /> occurs.
An attempt to set a value that is not a valid URI occurs.
The URI from which to extract the base URL.
Helper method that extracts the base URL from the specified URI.
The base URL that was extracted.
The URL returned is the original URL without the query string.
trans-unit.target: La dirección URL devuelta es la dirección URL original sin la cadena de consulta.

trans-unit.source: The parameter for which to search.
Returns the specified parameter value from the parameters dictionary.
The value of the parameter or <see langword="null" /> if the parameter does not exist.
The parameters dictionary is accessed through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.Parameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El diccionario de parámetros se accede a través del <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.Parameters%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parameter" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
Gets the message parameters as a dictionary.
A dictionary that contains the message parameters.
trans-unit.target: Un diccionario que contiene los parámetros de mensaje.

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of name and value pairs that contains the parameters in the message.
trans-unit.target: Un diccionario de pares de nombre y valor que contiene los parámetros en el mensaje.

trans-unit.source: The parameters are keyed by the parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Los parámetros están ordenados por el nombre del parámetro.

trans-unit.source: For example, to retrieve the value of the wattr parameter, use "wattr".
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, para recuperar el valor del parámetro wattr, use "wattr".

trans-unit.source: The URI to parse.
Helper method that parses the query string in the specified URI into a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> that contains the parameters in the query string.
<paramref name="data" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The name of the parameter to remove.
Removes a parameter from the parameters dictionary.
The parameters dictionary is accessed through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.Parameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El diccionario de parámetros se accede a través del <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.Parameters%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parameter" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
The name of the parameter to set.
The value to be assigned to the parameter.
Sets the value of a parameter in the parameters dictionary.
If the parameter does not exist in the dictionary, it is added to it.
trans-unit.target: Si el parámetro no existe en el diccionario, se agrega a ella.

trans-unit.source: The parameters dictionary is accessed through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.Parameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El diccionario de parámetros se accede a través del <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.Parameters%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parameter" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
-or-
<paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
The parameter name.
The parameter value.
Sets the value of a parameter in the parameters dictionary.
The value must be an absolute URI.
If the parameter does not exist in the dictionary, it is added.
trans-unit.target: Si el parámetro no existe en el diccionario, se agrega.

trans-unit.source: The parameters dictionary is accessed through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.Parameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El diccionario de parámetros se accede a través del <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.Parameters%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parameter" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" /> or not an absolute URI.
Validates the message.
The default implementation checks whether the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.BaseUri%2A> property contains an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: Las comprobaciones predeterminadas de implementación si el <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.BaseUri%2A> propiedad contiene un URI absoluto.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.BaseUri" /> property is <see langword="null" /> or is not an absolute URI.
The text writer to which the message is written out.
When overridden in a derived class, writes the message to the output stream.
You must override this method in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: Debe reemplazar este método en clases derivadas.

trans-unit.source: Your implementation should validate the message and throw an appropriate exception before writing it.
trans-unit.target: Su implementación debe validar el mensaje y se producirá una excepción adecuada antes de escribirlo.

trans-unit.source: Serializes the message as a form post and returns the resulting Form together with its Javascript as a string.
A string representation of the message as a Form together with its associated Javascript.
Returns a string representation of the message in query-string format.
The message in query-string format.

Creates a message that is composed of the URL specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.BaseUri%2A> property followed by a query string that is created from the parameters dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Crea un mensaje que se compone de la dirección URL especificada en el <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.BaseUri%2A> propiedad seguido de una cadena de consulta que se crea a partir del diccionario de parámetros.

trans-unit.source: The parameters dictionary is accessed through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.Parameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El diccionario de parámetros se accede a través del <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.Parameters%2A> propiedad.
